alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 1:31AM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches between 7000 and 9000 feet with up to two feet near the peaks. Southwest winds could gust between 45 and 55 mph with 60 mph possible on the ridges. * WHERE...Spring Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult or impossible at times. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some areas could see reduced visibility due to blowing snow. Gusty winds and heavy snow could result in increased avalanche danger.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
